title: Legal Amendment : Expansion of Tenant Rights
content: A legal amendment expanding tenant rights, including longer notice periods for eviction and rent control adjustments, will take effect on July 1, 2024. This aims to provide greater protection for tenants.

title: Enactment of law : Mortgage Lending Laws
content: A legal amendment affecting mortgage lending laws will enhance borrower protections, including caps on interest rates and fees, effective from March 1, 2025. Lenders and borrowers are advised to familiarize themselves with these changes.

title: Legal Amendment : Property Tax Rates
content: The recent legal amendment modifies property tax rates, introducing a progressive tax system effective from January 1, 2025. Property owners are encouraged to review the new tax brackets.

title: Legal Amendment : Introduction of Green Building Codes
content: New legal amendment introduces mandatory green building codes for new constructions starting January 1, 2025, to promote sustainability. Builders must comply with energy efficiency and environmental impact standards.
